column4: you could try pinging the broadcast address on your subnet, let run for a sec or two, stop that and run sudo arp -a to see if an ip address is associated. You can then run nmap against the address to search for open ports, and so on.
what is the broadcast address on my subnet?
if your ip address is 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.0, your broadcast address is 192.168.1.255
